0.name: Josie's
0.description: Neighborhood haunt with a pool table and cheap drinks

1.name: Spring Lounge
1.description: Neighborhood dive bar since the 1920s draws patrons from 8AM on for basic drinks & weekend bagels.

2.name: Lucy's
2.description: Easygoing hangout, famed for its eponymous owner, features pool, video games & a laid-back vibe.

3.name: KGB Bar
3.description: Readings & publication parties are regular events at this tiny Soviet-themed watering hole.

4.name: Doc Holiday's
4.description: Texas roadhouse-style bar in the East Village with biker bartenders & country music on the jukebox.

5.name: St Dymphna's
5.description: Irish watering hole dispensing pints & classic pub grub in a snug, patio-equipped setting.

6.name: Phoenix Bar
6.description: Gay & lesbian mainstay in the East Village known for its jukebox & relaxed atmosphere.

7.name: Berlin
7.description: Tiny, dimly-lit entertainment venue featuring DJs & live bands along with cocktails & beer.

8.name: Pineapple Club
8.description: International plates & tropical cocktails served in a vast locale with colorful, fashionable decor.

9.name: Death & Company
9.description: Bartenders in bow ties & suspenders recall the speakeasy era at this dark, moody cocktail lounge.

10.name: 169 Bar
10.description: Bar with palm trees, a leopard-print pool table & a small menu of oysters, borscht & dumplings.

11.name: Welcome to the Johnson's
11.description: Unpretentious bar with beer from a fridge, a jukebox & a 1970s wood-paneled-basement vibe.

12.name: Clockwork Bar
12.description: Storied punk rock bar & music club with an edgy backdrop of graffiti-covered walls & booths.

13.name: Mr. Fong's
13.description: Unassuming watering hole featuring Chinese-inspired cocktails & bar bites, plus a jukebox.

14.name: Clandestino
14.description: Hip, low-key barroom with cocktails, beer & wine in a cozy space with a pressed-tin ceiling.

16.name: Pianos
16.description: Hipsters pack this 2-level bar/music venue to hear live indie acts or dance to DJ sets upstairs.

17.name: Ray's Downtown
17.description: Watering hole with a dive bar vibe, disco ball & a pool table, serving beer & craft cocktails.

18.name: Kind Regards
18.description: A cocktail spot with loungey seating & occasional basement shows in the former Cake Shop space.

20.name: Flower Shop
20.description: Contemporary American cooking in a '70s-style space with colorful furnishings & a downstairs bar.

22.name: Forgtmenot
22.description: Funky taverna lures locals with drinks & simple American-Mediterranean dishes for brunch & dinner.

23.name: International Bar
23.description: Small, spare East barroom drawing locals who like their drinking with no pretensions.

24.name: The Back Room
24.description: Hideaway with a Prohibition-esque vibe, offering cocktails in teacups and beer in paper bags.

25.name: Attaboy
25.description: Innovative, creative cocktails & classic concoctions mixed up in a trendy industrial-style space.

26.name: Gilligan's
26.description: Design-focused property famed for its artistic public spaces, upscale rooms & hip bar scene.

28.name: The Up & Up
28.description: Dimly lit cocktail lounge offering sophisticated drinks plus snacks in a space with banquettes.

29.name: Bandits
29.description: Burgers & bar snacks in a retro, wood-lined watering hole, plus an innovative cocktail menu.

30.name: Katana Kitten
30.description: Cool, bi-level bar serving izakaya fare & traditional American bites, plus whimsical cocktails.

31.name: Employees Only
31.description: Inventive drinks are poured at this retro-looking, Prohibition-style bar.

32.name: Anfora
32.description: Sibling to nearby Dell'anima, this wine bar offers interesting glasses, plus beers, spirits & apps.

34.name: La Noxe
34.address: 315 7th Ave Entrance at, 162 W 28th St, New York, NY 10001
34.description: Intimate, dimly lit haunt with velvet seats offering cocktails & tapas in a laid-back atmosphere.

35.name: Raines Law Room Chelsea
35.description: A semi-secret entrance (ring bell) leads to this plush lounge crafting Prohibition-era cocktails.

37.name: Apotheke Chinatown
37.description: Mixologists in pharmacist-style garb whip up complex cocktails at this off-the-beaten path hideaway.

38.name: Basement
38.description: Cocktails, beer & wine served in a unique, dimly lit bar that has beer pong, dice games & darts.

39.name: Peachy's
39.description: Chic lounge under Chinese Tuxedo restaurant offering craft cocktails amid funky, retro Asian decor.

40.name: Mr. Purple
40.address: 180 Orchard St 15th floor, New York, NY 10002
40.description: On the Hotel Indigo's 15th floor, this posh spot with terraces serves elevated bar food & cocktails.

41.name: Overstory
41.address: 70 Pine St 64th Floor, New York, NY 10005

42.name: The Dead Rabbit NYC
42.description: This 2-story spot combines a lunch taproom with a parlor serving small plates & vintage cocktails.

43.name: Blarney Stone
43.description: Irish watering hole offering happy-hour scene & simple eats liked corned beef from a steam table.

45.name: The Roof at PUBLIC
45.description: Glassed-in rooftop bar at the Public Hotel with sweeping views, cocktails & a DJ-fueled party vibe.

46.name: Terroir
46.description: Relaxed, brick-lined wine bar with community tables, a large by-the-glass menu & Italian tapas.

48.name: Skin Contact
48.description: Small production, minimal intervention wines are the focus at this dimly lit haunt.

49.name: LELABAR
49.description: Cozy nook with oval-shaped bar, global wine list (plus tastings) & charcuterie menu.

50.name: Johnny's Bar
50.description: Neighborhood dive bar with daily shot specials & jukebox, bumper stickers & film-truck permits.

51.name: Art Bar
51.description: Village mainstay with comfortable, dimly lit back room offers cocktails & bar food.

52.name: Le Bain
52.address: The Standard, High Line, 848 Washington St, New York, NY 10014
52.description: There's a disco, bar, (seasonal) plunge pool & crêperie, all on the roof of the Standard Hotel.

53.name: Mace
53.description: Creative craft cocktails & snacks in a petite brick-walled space with some banquette seats & stools.

54.name: Please Don't Tell
54.address: 113 St Marks Pl, New York, NY 10009
54.description: Patrons who enter through a phone booth in Crif Dogs next door sip novel cocktails in a dark space.

55.name: The Wayland
55.description: Cutting-edge cocktails are served in a no-frills setting at this laid-back barroom.

56.name: Paul’s Casablanca
56.description: Chic cocktail lounge where Morocco-inspired decor sets the stage for drinking & dancing all night.

57.name: Ear Inn
57.description: Beers & bar bites are on the menu at this popular joint in a landmarked, circa-1817 building.

58.name: Paul's Baby Grand
58.description: Tribeca Grand Hotel cocktail lounge via scenemaker Paul Sevigny that's known for its tough door.

60.name: Georgia Room
60.address: 23 Lexington Ave 2nd floor, New York, NY 10010
60.description: 23 Lexington Ave 2nd floor, New York, NY 10010

61.name: Broken Shaker at Freehand New York
61.address: 23 Lexington Ave 2nd floor, New York, NY 10010
61.description: Tropical bar inspired by the Miami original with city views, sophisticated cocktails & bites.

62.name: Casa Mezcal
62.description: Creative Mexican cantina with an art gallery upstairs & a performance space in the basement.

63.name: Mother's Ruin
63.description: Bespoke cocktails, bar snacks & booze-filled slushies keep this neighborhood lounge bustling.

65.name: The Blond
65.description: Upscale, stylish nightspot at 11 Howard hotel featuring cocktails, DJs & an eclectic bar-bites menu.

66.name: Niche Niche
66.description: Dinner party-like concept pairing curated wines chosen by industry experts with complementary bites.

67.name: Ruffian
67.description: Intimate setting for premium wines with a menu of locally & seasonally inspired plates.

70.name: JIMMY
70.description: 18th-story cocktail lounge in James Hotel features an elegant, contemporary interior & rooftop deck.

71.name: Goldie's Bar
71.description: Creative cocktails & full bar offerings served in a sleek space with a Vegas throwback feel.

72.name: The Springs
72.description: Industrial-chic bar with art installations & a big back garden attract locals for cocktails & beer.

73.name: Saint Vitus Bar
73.description: Darkly lit bar & music venue on Greenpoint's northern end hosting metal bands & their enthusiasts.

74.name: Minnows
74.description: Easygoing hangout with nostalgic accents serving beers, along with burgers, hot dogs & fries.

75.name: Good Bar
75.description: Listening bar serving up vinyl tracks on a vintage turntable plus burgers, beer & cocktails.

76.name: Ponyboy
76.description: Hip cocktail bar mixing up specialty cocktails, plus an international food menu.

79.name: Pencil Factory
79.address: 142 Franklin St, Greenpoint Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11222
79.description: A tap beer selection is poured in a room with apothecary cabinets, brick walls & wide plank floors.

80.name: Ramona
80.description: Craft cocktails & sleek, vintage-inspired decor draws a vibrant crowd at this upscale watering hole.

81.name: Broken Land
81.description: Hip bar with wood floors & tin ceilings offering creative cocktails, plus a back patio.

84.name: The Palace
84.description: Simple pub grub & cocktails served in an old-timey setting with wood beams & stained-glass windows.

86.name: Coast and Valley
86.description: Wood-accented haunt serving California wines by the glass, bottle & flight plus complementary bites.

87.name: Rhodora Wine Bar
87.description: Relaxed wine bar with a zero waste goal serving tapas-style bites paired with natural wines.

88.name: Pinkerton Wine Bar
88.description: Intimate watering hole with quirky art on the walls & an extensive by-the-glass & bottle selection.

89.name: Westlight
89.description: Rooftop bar with panoramic skyline views from a terrace & glassed-in lounge plus craft cocktails.

90.name: Berry Park
90.description: A European beer list & an expansive rooftop are the draws at this German-accented barroom.

91.name: Creatures of All Kind Rooftop
91.description: Newest addition to the rooftop scene in Williamsburg. Airy, open retractable rooftop with select views of Manhattan. Lite bites and refreshing cocktails.

92.name: Bar Blondeau
92.description: Stylish French-inspired cocktail spot with a seafood-focused menu & sweeping views of Manhattan.

93.name: The Water Tower Bar
93.description: Glass-and-steel encased rooftop bar with murals & velvet sofas offering cocktails, bites & views.

94.name: Hotel Delmano
94.description: Popular Williamsburg bar serving cocktails in an upscale setting that recalls old New York.

98.name: MIDNIGHTS
98.description: Laid-back setting for contemporary American fare, creative cocktails & a garden-style patio.

99.name: The Gutter
99.description: Old-school, low-tech bowling alley with an attached barroom that hosts live music.

100.name: Turkey's Nest
100.description: Unassuming bar for beer & pitchers of cocktails.

101.name: Rocka Rolla
101.description: Hard-rocking joint with jukebox tunes, old-school signs, big beers, pinball & outdoor grill grub.

103.name: Duff's
103.description: South Williamsburg heavy-metal bar, with horror/biker memorabilia & a unique jukebox.

104.name: Lucky Dog
104.description: Jumping, brick-walled watering hole featuring booze, a dog-friendly policy, games & a backyard.

105.name: The Levee
105.description: Relaxed watering hole with beer, booze, hot dogs & snacks to fuel pool, darts & board game playing.

106.name: Skinny Dennis
106.description: Down-home, honky-tonk saloon pairing a woody space with beer, games & live country music.

107.name: East River Bar
107.description: No-frills barroom with cheap drinks, exposed-brick walls, a pool table & a spacious patio.

108.name: The Exley
108.description: Hip, rustic-chic gay bar with a relaxed vibe offering craft beer, cocktails, trivia nights & live music.

109.name: Macri Park
109.description: A laid-back, dimly lit watering hole with cozy interior decor, a big backyard, and drag nights.

110.name: Metropolitan
110.description: Gay & straight locals congregate at this bar with 2 fireplaces, a pool table & a lush outdoor space.

111.name: Alligator Lounge
111.description: Budget drinks come with free pizza as well as karaoke, pool & Skee-Ball at this no-frills bar.

112.name: la milagrosa
112.description: Bar hidden behind a deli, from the owner of Cerveceria Havemeyer, offering mezcal, ceviche & music.

113.name: The Drift
113.description: Cozy bar with leather banquettes & a patio serving lighthearted cocktails & Southern-tinged bites.

114.name: Night of Joy
114.description: Herbal infusions star in the elaborate cocktails at this antiques-filled lounge with a roof patio.

115.name: Fresh Kills Bar
115.description: Attractive space for carefully-prepared craft cocktails.

116.name: Pokito
116.description: Creative Latin-Asian cocktails offered in snug surrounds with whitewashed brick walls.

117.name: Tailfeather
117.description: Wine bar offering an array of natural selections

118.name: 68 Jay Street Bar
118.description: Mellow neighborhood meeting place for Dumbo locals serving wines, beers & spirits.

120.name: Celestine
120.description: Contemporary place for wood-fired Med & Middle Eastern fare with wine, cocktails & river views.

121.name: duckduck
121.description: Industrial-chic local bar with signature cocktails, craft beers & shots, weekend DJs & late closing.

122.name: The Rosemont
122.description: Laid-back queer cocktail bar with live jazz, small plates, craft beers & a garden patio.

124.name: Bushwick Country Club
124.description: Ironically named bar featuring cheap drinks, a photo booth & a six-hole mini-golf course.

125.name: Post No Bills
125.description: Narrow, relaxed bar with simple selection of draft & can beers, wine, classic cocktails & shots.

127.name: Baby's All Right
127.description: Cool haunt offering live music most nights, plus gourmet bar fare, creative drinks & weekend brunch.

129.name: TBA Brooklyn
129.description: Atmospheric nightclub & coffeehouse in a former garage featuring music, drinks & various events.

130.name: OTB
130.description: Stylish, modern bar & restaurant offering handcrafted cocktails, bar bites & global plates.

134.name: The Binc
134.description: Dark, intimate speakeasy with a chill, classy atmosphere, for creative cocktails & small plates.

135.name: Bohemien Bar
135.description: Listening bar with deep booths & a marble-topped bar serving light bites & craft cocktails.

136.name: PIPS
136.description: Cozy bar with coastal Italian vibes serving natural wines, Italian-style aperitifs & small plates.

140.name: Harriet's Rooftop
140.description: Rooftop spot for fancy cocktails & choice bites on the roof of 1 Hotel, with Manhattan views.

141.name: Le Boudoir
141.description: Styled after Marie Antoinette's chambers, this cozy hideaway offers cocktails, snacks & live jazz.

142.name: Olympia
142.description: Locally sourced small plates paired with wine & classic cocktails in a casual-chic setting.

143.name: The Emerson
143.description: Mellow hangout with craft cocktails, draft beer, local art & a tranquil garden patio.

144.name: Custom House
144.description: Local watering hole with understated decor, sidewalk & back-patio seating & a modern pub-fare menu.

145.name: Rooftop Reds
145.description: Innovative venue hosting wine tastings from its rooftop vineyard, plus dinners, yoga & movie nights.
